file_content.text: Enemy's running blind. Our troops are moving freely again. We're gonna melt this icicle good!
Ya done great. Got the activation signal from the Republic data relay, and we're already jamming their comm!
Thanks to you, things are gettin' hot 'round here!
Once you get the codes from a Republic relay, we'll be able to make big strides on this ice cube.
Nothin' but a bunch of namby-pamby cowards on this frozen rock.
Think I like hearing my teeth chatter and knees knock? My sweat freeze and breath blind me?
Not a scrap. But I got a job to do and by gum, I aim to do it!
Need help?
I have no sympathy.
Calm down!
Whoa, sorry about that, my lord, didn't see you. Kinda snow-blind, I guess.
Whoa, sorry about that, didn't see you. Kinda snow-blind, I guess.
None of those remarks were aimed at you. In fact, my mission calls for someone of your obvious capabilities.
Colonel Vannis left orders to stop the Republic from tracking our deployments here. I figured out the enemy's MO, but need the firepower to squash it.
Squashing the Republic is the Sith way.
I can do that.
Turn 'em into slush here, my lord.
How exactly has the Republic managed to get the best of us?
Tell me of this "MO."
Sneaky tricks and a lot of luck.
If you can pay, today's your lucky day.
I got firepower. For a price.
I can unfreeze some funds for this. For sure.
My gun's loaded.
I can help with that.
Heh. Most people 'round here complain their gun is frozen.
Give me the details.
Shouldn't be hard to find recruits around here.
And you're having trouble?
That's a laugh. Cold seems to have frozen everybody's guts.
Republic scouts have set up a series of short-range relays. Need to activate one to jam their communications.
Can't activate without a data card from one of the scouts. Gonna have to get one of them the old fashioned way. You game?
I'm in.
You're a lifesaver.
Be my compass.
Republic scouts range around the lower ruins. Spying on us and disappearing.
Get a data card off one of them and then find one of their relay consoles in the outer edge.
I'll be here and can jam their relays once you're done.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Heard that before. I'll probably be here if you change your mind.
Heard that before. I'll probably be here if any of you change your mind.
Cold feet is an understatement 'round here.
